short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real-time security for cloud-based SaaS applications, ensuring robust protection and swift response to threats and vulnerabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Empower your business growth along with data security by governing permission settings to secure all your Cloud SaaS applications and help your SOC teams gain deeper visibility into user actions. Enable secure data sharing over your applications and manage user permissions in real-time based on their activity and resource utilization with access control management policies.  

Our solution is compatible with all the popular cloud SaaS applications such as Shopify, Google Workspace, Atlassian, Office 365, and more to help you complete your day to day business tasks and collaborate with your team over shared data without compromising security and productivity.

Key Features:

1.  Real-Time Access Control: Control user permissions over all your cloud applications by enabling access restriction policies using IP addresses, Location, Time, and Devices for secure user authorization in real time to grant or revoke permissions with the miniOrange CASB.
2.  Data Security: Secure data stored on cloud SaaS applications and their sharing between users and third-party applications to prevent data breaches for permissions defined by the SOC admin. The miniOrange CASB actively monitors data leak points and implements security measures to fix them immediately.
3.  Compliance: Meet all your CASB compliance policies according to the industry security standards to stay ahead of the competition and prevent employees from breaking business policies and complying with them to work with industry standards.
4.  Deep Visibility: Help SOC teams gain deep visibility by monitoring when users and applications access your business data, down to the most granular level, to detect unusual patterns and then take the necessary security measures to prevent data breaches.
5.  Active Threat Detection: Actively monitor user behavior and your cloud infrastructure for security risks to prevent threat vectors from accessing your data in real-time to prevent unauthorized access and potential malware attacks targeting your business, all secured with the miniOrange CASB solution.
